name: VERIFIED VOTING
description: organization working toward accuracy, integrity, and verifiability of elections
sampleDescriptions: Funding for state and local governments to provide for the cybersecurity of infrastructure for federal elections through the purchase of auditable election systems and for the conduct of audits.
FY 2018 Omnibus Appropriations Bill: issues related to cybersecurity of voting and auditable federal elections.
FY 2019 Appropriations Bill: issues related to cybersecurity of voting and auditable federal elections.
